Exit App Corporate Email Address Persons Accept Terms and Conditions OK No Zipcode No Information Available Level Please zoom out and keep marker pressed\n and then Drag it to a particular location Please choose valid time This Platform provides the possibility for the Restaurants to get more clients through online ordering option and through table grabbing option\n For these services, you will be charged, for each booking made through our platform, 3 lei/person.\n Regarding the online order functionality, you will be charged 10% from the total order.\n We will issue the bill at the end of each month for the previous month and we will send it to you through your e mail/ or by post if you will request that.\n After we issue the bill, you will have 15 days at your disposal to pay.\n If the payment is not made within this period, you will be charged 0.2% as interest calculated daily from the total amount of the bill.\n This represents a contract and by accepting it, you acknowledge what is written above and subscribe to it.
